title: The Cry for help
creator_credit: Louisiana Association for Mental Health, George C Stoney Associates and George C. Stoney
brief_description: A training film for police officers and law enforcement agencies; presenting some of the major causes of suicide and follows with consequential discussion on how to handle the suicidal person. Quite powerful and graphic for it’s time.
